TextLibrary.Text: Tauron
It has come to my attention that your skills with the axe do not befit a Firewalker.
It has come to my attention that your skills with the axe do not befit a Firewalker.
It has come to my attention that your skills with the axe do not befit a Firewalker.
It has come to my attention that your skills with the axe do not befit a Firewalker.
We study many weapons in my homeland; the axe is only one of them. We favor the lance.
We study many weapons in my homeland; the axe is only one of them. We favor the lance.
We study many weapons in my homeland; the axe is only one of them. We favor the lance.
We study many weapons in my homeland; the axe is only one of them. We favor the lance.
Still, it is not fitting for a Firewalker to be anything less than a Master of the Axe.
Still, it is not fitting for a Firewalker to be anything less than a Master of the Axe.
Still, it is not fitting for a Firewalker to be anything less than a Master of the Axe.
Still, it is not fitting for a Firewalker to be anything less than a Master of the Axe.
Okay. Who will teach me? Sunspear?
Okay. Who will teach me? Sunspear?
Okay. Who will teach me? Sunspear?
Okay. Who will teach me? Sunspear?
Sunspear would be a fine teacher, but you will learn more if you seek out Red-Axe in the city of Tusk.
